name: Tarik's Weather Adventure - Chapter One
description:
Hello!

- My name is Tarik, and these are my 'Weather Adventure' games! First one in the row is the 'Lightning simulator' or 'Chapter One' where you can generate all sorts of lightnings. 

- I hope that you like my game, and if so, make sure to follow me for further updates,  leave a review and discuss about the game with the rest of the community down there. Thanks!
